item.title: What percentage of Americans were infected with Covid-19 on January 10?
item.description:
Trevor Bedford on Twitter

“Given ~680k cases per day, this would in turn suggest 0.8% or 1% of the US being infected with SARS-CoV-2 every day. This would translate to perhaps 5% or 10% of individuals currently infected with SARS-CoV-2 in the US. 15/15”

item.title: How are the post-Soviet economies doing?
item.description:
Today (well, yesterday, by the time you’re reading this) is the 30th anniversary of the fall of the Soviet Union, one of the most momentous geopolitical events of my lifetime. The main reason this was important wasn’t economic — it was proof that the fall of a superpower didn’t mean nuclear holocaust. And it meant the end of the Cold War, which brought …

URL: https://noahpinion.substack.com/p/how-are-the-post-soviet-economies?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: The Destinies of the Former Soviet Empire

item.title: The Racist Underbelly of MAGA Restrictionists
item.description:
The last meaningful reform of our immigration laws was enacted nearly four decades ago, yet virtually everyone—immigration advocates and foes alike—agree that our laws no longer serve the needs of the nation. Why is it, then, that we’ve been unable to change outdated laws, or even ensure an orderly flow on our borders? Many have pointed to Americans’ ec…

URL: https://theunpopulist.substack.com/p/the-racist-underbelly-of-maga-restrictionists?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: The Destinies of the Former Soviet Empire

item.title: What makes an "optimistic" vision of the future?
item.description:
“There will be no war and there will be no greed and all of the children will know how to read.” — Gene Roddenberry The Expanse just finished airing on Amazon, so I thought I’d write another post about sci-fi! I thought the final season was solid and the ending was good, but it felt rushed, as if substantial parts of the last season had been edited out. But simply ending well is something very few shows manage to do, so I count this as a win; The Expanse wins a place in my list of favorite sci-fi TV series of all time (a list I will get around to writing up at some point…

URL: https://noahpinion.substack.com/p/what-makes-an-optimistic-vision-of?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: The Destinies of the Former Soviet Empire
